meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jonathan Kuehnle Michelle Leppert Amy Nienaber Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6811.

td.p: Jonathan Kuehnle, a high school campus director from Springfield, Ohio
Michelle Leppert, a senior managing editor from Danvers, Massachusetts
Amy Nienaber, an aspiring student from Bettendorf, Iowa (whose 2-day cash winnings total $51,000)

tr.td: ICE CREAM PARLOR WORDS
INNOVATION
AUTHORS' PLOTS
GUITARS
TV HOSTS BY INITIALS
THE USS OLYMPIA
